p: The powdered leaves of Chenopodium ambrosioides (750 g) was placed in a conical flask and methanol of up to four times of the proportion of powdered leaves was added. It was allowed to stand for a few hours and decanted. More solvent was added, and the process was repeated twice. The extract was concentrated in a rotary evaporator. The dried extract was stored in small-capped plastic air-tight containers at 4 Â°C until required for analysis.
